content: I am looking for ways to implement profanity filters, message timeout, and slow mode. I'm guessing this would be possible using integrations, but I don't know which ones to use.

Have you seen https://zulip.com/help/moderating-open-organizations ?

There has been previous discussion of word filters, but I'm not aware of an established solution right now.

Could you describe what you are looking for regarding 'message timeout' and 'slow mode' features?
@Fender Bolt just adding a mention to make sure you saw the reply!
Slow mode is a Discord feature to rate-limit message sending.
I'm assuming "message timeout" is also referencing the Discord feature which blocks interaction by a user for some amount of time.

I think both of those would need to be built-in features, not integrations. Certainly things we could spec out if we wanted to prioritize them. FWIW we haven't gotten many requests for either, I think in part because Zulip's topics make it easier to directly moderate by sending messages asking people to cut it out or whatever.

But it also probably reflects the fact that our communities are generally more balanced towards the types of organizations that don't have to deal with a large number of determined bad actors trying to misbehave.
